basics.name: Chris J. Kolenko
basics.label: Principal DevOps Engineer / Head of DevOps
basics.summary: Principal DevOps Engineer with extensive expertise in Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Amazon Web Services (AWS), .NET, software development, cloud infrastructure, DevOps practices, and platform engineering. Proven track record of architecting and implementing scalable, cost-efficient solutions across multi-cloud environments while optimising complex systems to drive organisational success. Skilled in promoting a DevOps-first culture, leveraging Shift Left principles, and building high-performing cross-functional teams. Proficient in applying Lean Methodology to bring innovative concepts to production, using data-driven insights to continuously refine solutions, and enhancing decision-making within Azure, GCP, AWS, and .NET ecosystems. Experienced in leading transformational projects and delivering measurable business impact through technical excellence.
